# GridListTileBar API

<p className="description">The API documentation of the GridListTileBar React component. Learn more about the props and the CSS customization points.</p>

## Import

```js
import GridListTileBar from '@material-ui/core/GridListTileBar';
// or
import { GridListTileBar } from '@material-ui/core';
```

You can learn more about the difference by [reading this guide](/guides/minimizing-bundle-size/).



## Props

| Name | Type | Default | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| <span className="prop-name">actionIcon</span> | <span className="prop-type">node</span> |  | An IconButton element to be used as secondary action target (primary action target is the tile itself). |
| <span className="prop-name">actionPosition</span> | <span className="prop-type">'left'<br />&#124;&nbsp;'right'</span> | <span className="prop-default">'right'</span> | Position of secondary action IconButton. |
| <span className="prop-name">classes</span> | <span className="prop-type">object</span> |  | Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See [CSS API](#css) below for more details. |
| <span className="prop-name">subtitle</span> | <span className="prop-type">node</span> |  | String or element serving as subtitle (support text). |
| <span className="prop-name">title</span> | <span className="prop-type">node</span> |  | Title to be displayed on tile. |
| <span className="prop-name">titlePosition</span> | <span className="prop-type">'top'<br />&#124;&nbsp;'bottom'</span> | <span className="prop-default">'bottom'</span> | Position of the title bar. |

The `ref` is forwarded to the root element.

Any other props supplied will be provided to the root element (native element).

## CSS

- Style sheet name: `MuiGridListTileBar`.
- Style sheet details:

| Rule name | Global class | Description |
|:-----|:-------------|:------------|
| <span className="prop-name">root</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-root</span> | Styles applied to the root element.
| <span className="prop-name">titlePositionBottom</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-titlePositionBottom</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `titlePosition="bottom"`.
| <span className="prop-name">titlePositionTop</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-titlePositionTop</span> | Styles applied to the root element if `titlePosition="top"`.
| <span className="prop-name">rootSubtitle</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-rootSubtitle</span> | Styles applied to the root element if a `subtitle` is provided.
| <span className="prop-name">titleWrap</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-titleWrap</span> | Styles applied to the title and subtitle container element.
| <span className="prop-name">titleWrapActionPosLeft</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-titleWrapActionPosLeft</span> | Styles applied to the container element if `actionPosition="left"`.
| <span className="prop-name">titleWrapActionPosRight</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-titleWrapActionPosRight</span> | Styles applied to the container element if `actionPosition="right"`.
| <span className="prop-name">title</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-title</span> | Styles applied to the title container element.
| <span className="prop-name">subtitle</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-subtitle</span> | Styles applied to the subtitle container element.
| <span className="prop-name">actionIcon</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-actionIcon</span> | Styles applied to the actionIcon if supplied.
| <span className="prop-name">actionIconActionPosLeft</span> | <span className="prop-name">MuiGridListTileBar-actionIconActionPosLeft</span> | Styles applied to the actionIcon if `actionPosition="left"`.

You can override the style of the component thanks to one of these customization points:

- With a rule name of the [`classes` object prop](/customization/components/#overriding-styles-with-classes).
- With a [global class name](/customization/components/#overriding-styles-with-global-class-names).
- With a theme and an [`overrides` property](/customization/globals/#css).

If that's not sufficient, you can check the [implementation of the component](https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/blob/master/packages/material-ui/src/GridListTileBar/GridListTileBar.js) for more detail.
